text: The station building in 1951 Nanning railway station (, also spelled Nanning Huǒchē Zhàn or Nanning Huochezhan)"Nanning Train" on chinatouronline.com is the main railway station serving the city of Nanning, the capital of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China. It is located in the city centre, at 82 Zhonghua Road, in the district of Xixiangtang. ==Overview== The station opened in February 1951 and the upgrade of building and platforms, to allow high- speed train services also, was completed in December 2013. It is the junction point of the Nanning–Kunming Railway, the Hunan–Guangxi Railway, the Nanfang Railway, the Nanning–Guangzhou Railway, the Liuzhou–Nanning Intercity Railway, and the Yunnan–Guangxi Railway (under construction). ==Services== *Rapid transit: Nanning Metro lines 1 and 2 are both connected to the station. *Regional services:Nanning rail timetable on cnvol.com the station is connected to Liuzhou, Guilin, Wuzhou, Guigang, Qinzhou, Fangchenggang, Beihai and others. *National services: the station is connected to Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Chengdu, Kunming, Xiamen, Nanjing, Shenzhen, Wuhan, Xi'an, Qingdao, Changsha and other major cities. One of this services is the "Beijing-Nanning Through Train". *International services: the station is served by the "Beijing-Nanning-Hanoi Through Train", that connects the Chinese and the Vietnamese national capitals. The planned Nanning–Pingxiang high-speed line,"China-Singapore HS" on Railways Africa magazine part of the Nanning–Singapore economic corridor"Nanning-Singapore Economic Corridor" (Beijing Review) and of the Kunming–Singapore Rail Network, would connect also Nanning Station to Cambodia, Malaysia and Singapore. "An HST line will connect China to Singapore" (Business Travel.fr) ==See also== *Nanning Rail Transit *Nanning Locomotive Depot ==References== ==External links== Category:Railway stations in Guangxi Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1951 Category:Stations on the Liuzhou–Nanning Intercity Railway Category:Buildings and structures in Nanning
title: Nanning railway station
